title: Parking Heated Pool with Sundeck, Bike Storage Available
map_address: 6760 S Glencoe St near E Arapahoe
posting_body: Welcome to Villas at Holly Apartment Homes
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 740 Sq.
Villas at Holly is filled with exceptional amenities that are right outside your doorstep.
Get outside and enjoy a walk through our landscaped courtyard on your way to take a nice relaxing dip in our outdoor pool.
Or, you can spend some quality time with your pet by taking them for a play date at the pet park.
Stay active and enjoy a workout at the fitness center with a range of equipment that is sure to make your routine anything but boring.
We also have an outdoor kitchen and seating area that gives you the space you need to host fun events and gatherings.
Extra perks throughout our community include on-site maintenance and management, complimentary Wi-Fi, and options for short-term leases.
Join our apartments for rent in Centennial, CO and do not miss out on all the outstanding amenities within our community!

Beautiful Kitchen Featuring Large Island*, Custom Cabinetry*, and a Full Suite of Stainless Steel Appliances*, Central Heat & Air Conditioning, Over-Sized Bedrooms with Walk-In Closets*, Gas or Wood Burning Fireplace*, Private Patio or Balcony, Brand New Studio, 1-, and 2-Bedroom Homes, In-Home Washer & Dryer, Plank-Style Wood Flooring

24-Hour Fitness Center, Community BBQ Grill Outdoor Kitchen with Covered Seating Area, Bike Storage Available, Carports Available, Pet-Friendly Community with Dog Park & Pampered Pet Wash Station, On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, & On-Call Courtesy Patrol, Beautiful Courtyard with Community Playground, Parking Heated Pool with Sundeck, Resident Clubhouse with Business Center
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
